snippet: No one likes to pay bank fees. And they are even more annoying when the amount and variety of fees can vary depending not only on where you bank, but also on the state where you live.
abstract: No one likes to pay bank fees. And they are even more annoying when the amount and variety of fees can vary depending not only on where you bank, but also on the state where you live.

headline.main: How Checking Account Fees and Terms Vary by State
